jcr:root.jcr:description.ga: Bríste Gearr Lúthcleasach do na Fir
jcr:root.jcr:title: Tuareg Summer
jcr:root.features:
• Lightweight, breathable cotton keeps you cool on hot summer days
  • Large pockets secure essentials like your keys and wallet
  • Comes in range of colors
  • Easywash, pre-shrunk and stain-resistant
jcr:root.features.ga:
• Cadás thrécaoiltech éadrom a coinníonn tú fionnuar ar laethanta te ar tsamhraidh
  • Pócaí mór a connigh slán rudaí riachtanach cosúil do eochair agus sparán
  • Thagann sé i réimse na dathanna
  • Éasca a nigh agus a chomhracfaidh smáil
jcr:root.summary: Easywash lightweight cotton keeps you cool and comfortable in the hottest weather. Pre-shrunk stain-resistant fabric. Extra-deep front pockets. Natural Fit is relaxed through the hip and thigh with straight legs. Double stitching throughout. Machine wash and dry.
jcr:root.summary.ga: Éasca a nigh cadás éadrom a coinníonn tú fionnuar agus compordach san aimsir is teo. Fabraic a chomhracfaidh smáil. Pócaí breise tosaigh domhain. Tá oiriúnach nádúrtha scíth a ligean tríd an cromáin agus leis le cosa díreach. Fuála dúbhailte ar fud. Níochán meaisín agus tirim.
